about_the_game:
This game contains 6 popular sports: soccer, volleyball, dodgeball, kickball, tennis, and golf!
But there's a unqiue twist: in Big Ball Sports, the ball is bigger than you!
This oversized ball offers players unpredictable and wild moments, making gameplay even more fun and challenging!
Regular rules taking on new meanings as you test your sports skills in games sure to bring smiles and excitement!
It's a sports party game that offers easy controls and big fun for everyone!

In Big Ball Sports, enjoy the following 6 sports:
【Soccer】
Aim for your opponent's goal with a gigantic soccer ball and make a miraculous score!

【Volleyball】
Experience the fun and thrill of volleyball by sending a large ball flying over the net to your opponent.

【Dodgeball】
Throw a large ball at your opponents and engage in action-packed dodgeball battles.

【Kickball】
A fusion of baseball and soccer, enjoy a new sports experience kicking a big ball.

【Tennis】
Feel the tension of tennis as you challenge your opponent with a large tennis ball.

【Golf】
Drive a big golf ball onto the course, aiming for a hole-in-one. The challenge of golf awaits!
